Hi Greg,

What about adding a link@rel=3D"edit" (?) or other rel value to t=
he app:collection, to which you could PATCH a feed?  Would we have to updat=
e the media type application/atom+xml;type=3Dfeed with the extended semanti=
cs, but they are backwards compatible so probably not.

Peter

me stuff over atom. One thing I found interesting
and maybe someone could p=
oint me in the spec where this is covered (I

ost 10 new items to the collection as a
